login_desc:
Please wait a moment, we are logging you in.

If nothing happens, please use the button below.
java_modal_desc: Entweder hast du Java nicht installiert oder wir konnten es nicht finden. Wenn du java installiert hast, setze bitte den Installationsort in den Enstellungen. Wenn du java noch nicht installiert hast, musst du dies tun, damit Minecraft starten kann.
accounts_limit: You have reached the maximum number of accounts
nomcprofile: This account does not own Minecraft
settings_minimize_desc: Minimize the launcher after starting Minecraft
settings_richpresence_desc: Deactivates the "Paying Blueknight Launcher" status for Discord
settings_ram_desc: How much memory (RAM) should minecraft be allowed to use?
settings_java_desc: Please only change this option, if you know what you are doing! (Java 17 or newer recommended)
settings_autoUpdates_desc: Should the launcher check for updates on startup?
